name: OG Video Repurposing
description:
Repurpose user-provided videos with Stein-like transformations (stretch, slowdown, fade-in, logo watermarks). Each call creates an algorithmically unique output from your video.

cURL command:
curl -X POST https://api.runpod.ai/v2/66as0tbqrsm2fp/runsync \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_RUNPOD_API_KEY" \
  -d '{"input": {"action": "og", "video_url": "https://example.com/video.mp4"}}'
